snippet: The Yale Baroque Opera Project, which focuses on staged productions of operas featuring casts of undergraduates, presented Monteverdi’s “Ritorno d’Ulisse,” at the University Theater at Yale.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews Yale Baroque Opera Project production of Monteverdi's Il Ritorno d’Ulisse in Patria, directed by Toni Dorfman at the University Theater.
lead_paragraph: The Yale Baroque Opera Project, which focuses on staged productions of operas featuring casts of undergraduates, presented Monteverdi’s “Ritorno d’Ulisse,” at the University Theater at Yale.

headline.seo: Yale Baroque Opera Project, at University Theater, New Haven
headline.main: Ulysses Goes to College, in a Lively Monteverdi
headline.print_headline: Ulysses Goes to College, in a Lively Monteverdi
